tool_description: Analyzes zoning maps to determine the official zoning designation for specific coordinates or property locations, including overlay districts and special zones.
error_messages: Coordinates out of bounds: The provided coordinates fall outside the jurisdiction boundaries.
Map data unavailable: Zoning map data is not available for the specified jurisdiction.
Coordinate precision error: Coordinates must be provided with sufficient decimal precision for accurate mapping.
usage: Input precise latitude and longitude coordinates along with jurisdiction name to determine official zoning designation. Essential for establishing baseline compliance requirements.

overlay_districts.description: Any overlay zoning districts that apply

special_designations.description: Special zoning designations or historic districts

zoning_effective_date.description: Date when current zoning became effective
